description:
Maximum warmth for cold days, the Kari Traa Rose Long Sleeve helps you build your defense against heat-sneaking winter. The pure merino fabric is super-fine, soft and offers complete freedom of movement. The knit rose pattern and contrasting seams? Just a nod to the Kari Traa hometown of Trysil, Norway.

  • 240 gsm merino wool has 4-way stretch for unrestricted motion
  • Fabric is naturally antimicrobial for odour management
  • Thinner 180 gsm side panels for breathability
name: Kari Traa Rose Long Sleeve Top - Women's
